verbs.description: [ARG1: at least 12] [V: injured] [ARGM-TMP: after false report of shooting at lil wayne concert in atlanta] pandemonium erupted sunday night in atlanta at a lil wayne concert that ended with at least a dozen people receiving minor injuries police said people tried to flee after somebody in the crowd reportedly yelled that gunshots had been fired atlanta police public affairs officer jarius daugh lil wayne georgia freight depot atlanta police public affairs jarius daugherty officer lil wayne concert cnn atlanta
